title: Woodbridge Pub
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Local bar in historic neighborhood with tin ceilings, terrazzo floors and carved wood bar. Local craft beers available, as well as full bar. Seasonal menu. Uses locally sourced ingredients. Several vegan items on menu at all times, all clearly marked, plus additional vegetarian items. White bean burger and stever mcFever black bean burger are staples. White bean dip appetizer. vegan special soup, salad and entree also available any season, such as pistachio encrusted tofu. Free Wi-Fi. Brunch Sunday morning and pizza in afternoon.
